predicate.note: Frames file for 'fidget' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

roleset.name: to behave restlessly, play or fuss

example.name: transitive
example.text: It [*EXP*-2] is indeed hard [*] to back away from a widely publicized forecast , and Mr. Straszheim is fidgeting with the handcuffs on this trip .
